title: Adam Stone: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Join author and educator Adam Stone as he discusses his book, "Pointy Three." Presented in both American Sign Language (ASL) and English, this is the story of a fork who’s missing one of his prongs, but not his brave spirit. Follow Pointy Three on his journey through the land of Dinnertime as he meets characters left and right and looks for a place where he belongs. Adam also demonstrates how to use iBooks Author and answers a few questions.
